sentence: Trump-endorsed Northeast Ohio congressional candidates Max Miller (OH-7) and Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (OH-13) spoke, too.
author: Ben Orner
title: Trump in Ohio: Endorsements, falsehoods and attacks on Democrats highlight Delaware rally

sentence: Also taking the stage were MyPillow CEO Mike Lindell – who peddles conspiracies about the 2020 election – 7th Congressional District candidate Max Miller and 13th Congressional District candidate Madison Gesiotto Gilbert.
author: Mary Jane Sanese
title: Highlights from Donald Trump's rally in Ohio at Delaware County Fairgrounds
